analyzed: bden tshhig sri zhu'i sgra byed pa'o/_/sems kyi sngon bzhin dug lnga dor/_/mngan

original: sbya sems mi spang ba dang /_/mig 'drar lta zhing gdung bar bya/_/gnod🔽sems spang dang rnam bcu'o/_/gsang ba'i phyir ni mi smra ba/_/spyi dang bar🔽gsang bzhi bzhi dang /_/'os dang gnyer gtad rnam pa bcu/_/sems kyis

translated: The ten points of the mind are: not to abandon the mind of awakening, to look with eyes like those of a deer, to be loving, to be compassionate, to be joyful, to be impartial, to be without pride, to be without deceit, to be without hypocrisy, and to abandon harmful thoughts.🔽The ten points of the secret are: not to speak of the secret, the four general secrets, the four special secrets, the appropriate secrets, and the entrusted secrets.🔽The ten points of the mind are: not to think of the secret with a wavering mind, not to speak of it with the voice, not to indicate it with the body, not to write it down, and not to show it to others.

original: brtan par mi bsam zhing /_/ngag gis brjod par yong mi bya/_/lus brdas
analyzed: brtan par mi bsam zhing /_/ngag gis brjod par yong mi bya/_/lus brdas

translated: and the near ones and the attendants will always protect you.🔽  The wish-fulfilling jewel will be the source of all

original: yid 'ong gter 'dod bsam 'grub cing /_/phun sum tshhogs yon rgyud  las
analyzed: yid 'ong gter 'dod bsam 'grub cing /_/phun sum tshhogs yon rgyud  las
translated: good qualities,🔽and the water of the sacred pledge vajra will be experienced.

original: 'byung /_/myong la dam tshhig rdo rje chu/_/bzhag cing go bas bsgrags byas na/_/
analyzed: 'byung /_/myong la dam tshhig rdo rje chu/_/bzhag cing go bas bsgrags byas na/_/
translated: If you are proclaimed by the one who understands,🔽and if you are free from the bonds of the five classes,🔽then even if you become Rāghava,

original: rgyud lnga tha tshhigs bral 'gyur na/_/rag sha yag shar gyur nas kyang /_/bsad
analyzed: rgyud lnga tha tshhigs bral 'gyur na/_/rag sha yag shar gyur nas kyang /_/bsad
translated: you will be killed and🔽transferred to the great hell.🔽  The suffering there is unbearable.

original: bstan 'gyur_rgyudargyud_ nas dmyal ba chen por rgyud/_/de yi sdug bsngal bzod glags chad/_/sa ma
analyzed: bstan 'gyur_rgyudargyud_ nas dmyal ba chen por rgyud/_/de yi sdug bsngal bzod glags chad/_/sa ma
translated: In the Sāmayamañjarī Tantra it says:

original: ya'i tan+t+ra las/_/nyes gsum thos pa'ang nyam nga na/_/'di phyis mthong myong🔽smos ci dgos/_/de bas rgyun du mdo bshags bsngo/_/gang dag sa gzhi med
analyzed: ya'i tan+t+ra las/_/nyes gsum thos pa'ang nyam nga na/_/'di phyis mthong myong smos ci dgos/_/de bas rgyun du mdo bshags bsngo/_/gang dag sa gzhi med
translated: “If you are frightened by just hearing about the three faults,🔽what need is there to mention seeing or experiencing them later?”🔽  Therefore, always recite the confession of downfalls and dedicate the merit.🔽  For those who do not have a piece of land,

original: pa dag_/tshhul 'chos phyir na yon tan brjod/_/nyes smra rdo rje'i dam ldan
analyzed: pa dag_/tshhul 'chos phyir na yon tan brjod/_/nyes smra rdo rje'i dam ldan
translated: in order to make amends, recite the qualities.

original: min/_/lhag par bdag ldan smos phyir ro/_/rnal 'byor lam mthar phyin
analyzed: min/_/lhag par bdag ldan smos phyir ro/_/rnal 'byor lam mthar phyin
translated: Having perfected the path of yoga,🔽for the sake of self and other, the subtle and pervasive [mind] is gathered.

original: bya zhing /_/bdag gzhan don phyir phra rgyas bsdus/_/dal ba'i dge rtsha gang
analyzed: bya zhing /_/bdag gzhan don phyir phra rgyas bsdus/_/dal ba'i dge rtsha gang
translated: Whatever virtue I have gathered through leisure,

original: yod pas_/mtha' yas rdo rje gsum thob shog_/dam tshhig phra rgyas
analyzed: yod pas_/mtha' yas rdo rje gsum thob shog_/dam tshhig phra rgyas
translated: may I attain the limitless three vajras.

original: bstan pa rdzogs so//_//_/_/_/_/_'di na ba'i
analyzed: bstan pa rdzogs so//_//_/_/_/_/_'di na ba'i
translated: The teaching on the subtle and pervasive [mind] is complete.🔽Here, the subtle and pervasive [mind] is the root of all phenomena.
